sen.j: 竜宮浜海水浴場（りゅうぐうはま かいすいよくじょう）は、京都府舞鶴市の日本海に面する海水浴場。
sen.e: Ryuguhama Kaisui Yokujo (Ryuguhama Seaside Resort) is a seaside resort facing the Sea of Japan located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Ryuguhama Kaisui Yokujo (Ryuguhama Seaside Resort) is a seaside resort facing the Sea of Japan, located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Ryuguhama Kaisui Yokujo (Ryuguhama Seaside Resort) is a seaside resort facing the Sea of Japan, located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 三浜海水浴場と小橋海水浴場の二つの浜で構成される。
sen.e: It consists of two beaches: Mihama beach, and Kohama beach.
It consists of two beaches: Mihama beach, and Kohama beach.
It consists of two beaches: Mihama beach, and Kohashi beach.

sen.j: 大浦半島の西にある遠浅の白浜で、全長は約1.5km。
sen.e: It is a white shallow beach of approximately 1.5 km in total length located on the west side of Oura Peninsula.
It is a beach of white sand where the sea is shallow, approximately 1.5 km in length located on the west side of Oura Peninsula.
sen.cmt: 「white shallow beach of」→「beach of white sand where the sea is shallow,」, 「total」削除
sen.e: It is a beach of white sand where the sea is shallow, approximately 1.5 km in length located on the west side of Oura Peninsula.

sen.j: 一帯は若狭湾国定公園に指定され、沖合いの島々が望める豊かな自然が魅力的である。
sen.e: Its neighborhood is designated as Wakasa Wan Quasi-National Park blessed with rich natural environment and great scenery of many islands on the sea.
Its neighborhood is designated as Wakasa Wan Quasi-National Park, which is blessed with a rich natural environment and has great views of the many islands on the sea.
sen.cmt: 「, which is」挿入,「a」挿入,「has」挿入,「the」挿入, 「on」→「in」
sen.e: Its neighborhood is designated as Wakasa Bay Quasi-National Park, which is blessed with a rich natural environment and has great views of the many islands on the sea.
The beaches open in early July every year.
The beaches open in early July every year.
The beaches open in early July every year.

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道 舞鶴線 東舞鶴駅からバスで約35分。
sen.e: From Higashimaizuru Station on Maizuru Line of West Japan Railway Company, a bus takes you to the beaches in approximately 35 minutes.
From Higashimaizuru Station on the Maizuru Line run by the West Japan Railway Company, a bus takes you to the beaches in approximately 35 minutes.
sen.cmt: 「the」挿入, 「of」→「run by the」. Giving the name of the company is a little unnatural - it may be better to remove 'run by the West Japan Railway Company'.
sen.e: From Higashi-Maizuru Station on the Maizuru Line run by the West Japan Railway Company, a bus takes you to the beaches in approximately thirty-five minutes.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 京都駅から特別急行列車まいづるに乗り、約1時間30分で東舞鶴駅着。
sen.e: From Kyoto Station, Limited Express Maizuru takes you to Higashimaizuru Station in approximately 90 minutes.
From Kyoto Station, the Limited Express Maizuru takes you to Higashimaizuru Station in approximately 90 minutes.
From Kyoto Station, the Limited Express Maizuru takes you to Higashimaizuru Station in approximately 90 minutes.

sen.j: 舞鶴若狭自動車道 舞鶴東インターチェンジから大浦半島方面。
sen.e: From the exit at Higashimaizuru Interchange of Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, drive headed for Oura Peninsula.
From the Higashimaizuru Interchange on the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, drive towards Oura Peninsula.
From the Higashi-Maizuru Interchange on the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, drive towards Oura Peninsula.
Parking
Parking
Parking
\1000 per day
\1000 per day
1000 yen per day

sen.j: トイレ・公共シャワー
sen.e: Communal rest rooms and showers
Communal rest rooms and showers
Public rest rooms and showers
sen.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しました。

sen.e: Available
